Articles.Content:
Hi 

I am sam 

I want to join you ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

sory do not speak English good ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

Hey there, don't worry about your Engrish speaking skills. You will get better at it the more time you spend here.

Welcome to the forums! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Welcome, you seem to speak English well enough.

Hello, and welcome to the game and forums!

Hullo there! Lucky for you, we have an [international section](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/18-International) on the forum. Where are you from? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
